title: Patient-Reported Outcome Measures in Individuals With Hereditary or Sporadic Kidney Cancer

summary.text: **KEY FINDING**: 67% completion rate achieved through tailored reminders, improving trial retention.
**TACTICAL WIN [SHIP NOW]**: Integrate AI-driven adaptive questionnaires to reduce burden and enhance engagement.
